q: the 76ers had two jerseys made up: one for Allen Iverson and one for Stephon Marbury , the other talented point guard in the draft. After the second workout, Brad Greenberg knew the Stephon Marbury jersey would not be needed. He's a special athlete and a special competitor and he has leadership ability, Brad Greenberg said of Allen Iverson .`` He made it an easy decision.''
